data.title: You want variety?? This is your place!
data.text: Talk about a WIDE selection of worldwide dishes! American, Asian, Indian, etc.  it was hard to choose, but I ended up with the best butternut squash ravioli you'll ever lay eyes on.  This restaurant is a full bar, great atmosphere! Our friends loved it too.

data.title: First time here, good food, nice atmosphere
data.text: We ate off of their "around the world" section of their menu. It was good, a bit spicy if you like that. Different food than I've seen other places, so nice variety and a chance to try something new.  Otherwise, bar type food with a bar type atmosphere that was relaxed. Very good service.

data.title: Great food and service
data.text: Pleasantly surprised by quality of food and service. Steak sandwich was terrific tasty, tender and delicious. Great place in St Cloud.

data.title: Interesting
data.text: This was a fun bar/ restaurant.   Lots of different types of food to choose from.  Went because it is within walking distance of the convention center.   Everyone in our group thought the food was good and staff was friendly.

data.title: Delicious food and great service!
data.text: We stopped as a family.   The wait staff was friendly and attentive.   We appreciate the interesting variety in the menu and a good selection of beers.   We definitely recommend this place....good eats!

data.title: Wonderful food!!
data.text: Some of the best and unique food in the St. Cloud area.  They always have interesting specials and food from around the world.

data.title: A nice little find!
data.text: We were walking downtown St. Cloud ( which by the way is very quaint) and stumbled upon this bar/restaurant.  Hamburgers were to die for - we splint one on the advice of our waitress and she was right.  Good food at a reasonable price.

data.title: Diverse menu and friendly staff
data.text: Very busy at 8pm on a Saturday night, but they kept the wait at a minimum. A very diverse menu from hamburgers to steak to Thai dishes. For as busy as they were, the service was good. Very attentive busser/expeditor. Employees did a super job of working as a team. Spicy Thai Salad was good, perfect heat. Crab Cakes were obviously freshly made and delicious. Hamburger had good flavor and was filling. Prices were good for the location in the downtown district. Bonus: crazy busy place and clean restrooms!

data.title: Hard to choose what type of vist
data.text:
I go to the White Horse as often as I can! Business it's a good place to meet as not extraordinarily noisy wait staff is only there when need beside as to not be interrupted 
Family I go with my wife and daughter and always see other families there as it isn't just a bar yet the beer selection is as good as any around. Always have a Surly or two as well as something unique that's worth trying
Couples it's a great place for a date as the theater is near by so can stop both before and after... Dinner and a show and a bump before head home... great date night
I've even been there solo and the bartender is friendly and again not overly 
I recommend the White Horse all the time!

data.title: To me, just okay.
data.text: Food wise I feel you can get the same if not better elsewhere but after dinner hours the bar is a great place to get a drink. The bartenders are awesome and the vibe is Pretty chill compared to other places in town.

data.title: It was good enough.
data.text: The drinks and staff were better than the food. .. the food was too salty.  It was a fun place to go and I'd come again if in town.

data.title: Excellent food and service, fun atmosphere
data.text: We've eaten here for lunch and dinner and both were excellent. When you walk in you think it's just a fun bar -- but it is an EXCELLENT restaurant as well. Servers are quick and friendly, entrees are imaginative and delicious. I had fettucine alfredo and it was interesting - lots of veggies in addition to the traditional alfredo sauce. Very tasty and enough to take home for a second meal. Hubby had the Thai curry which he loved. Lots of international offerings on the menu - bulgogi lettuce wraps, other curries - and apparently a chef with the talent to prepare them all well. Great experience! Located on a fun street with some shops and other restaurants.

data.title: Possibly the best restaurant in St Cloud
data.text: I continue to go back to this place over and over and am glad every time I go.  By the looks of the place, you would think it is just your typical bar and grill.  Nothing could be farther from the truth.  The menu is eclectic, daring and bold.  It has your standard fare, but then goes so much farther.  There is a highly Thai influence sprinkled throughout.  I would definitely recommend the Thai wings, the and steak salad (although it is VERY salty).  Every time we have eaten here, we have tried new dishes and have been pleasantly surprised each time.  The lunch and dinner menus are slightly different, so keep that in mind.  The late night bar menu is perfect as well. Order a pizza and some apps and you cant go wrong.

data.title: Love their food
data.text: Great menu selection, unique for St. Cloud.  Definitely one of the top few places to eat in St. Cloud.  Menu has traditional items such as steak and multiple Indian/SE Asian selections on the menu.

data.title: Great place to meet friends
data.text:
White Horse has an innovative menu.  They find ways to keep it interesting. Good beer selection and nice atmosphere. 
Highly recommended!!

data.title: Great Cuisine
data.text: I love the White Horse, especially their Thai Chicken Curry, Madras and of course the steak salad. I actually crave the salad. I have been her numerous times and highly recommend to others.

data.title: always a great place for lunch
data.text: Whenever we visit St. Cloud we try and have lunch at the White Horse.  We have never been disappointed with the food or the service.  My wife and I recently had lunch there with my 91 year old mother, and our daughter.  My mother ordered the German burger and enjoyed it very much and even had 1/2 her sandwich to take home for another meal.  The White Horse always serves large portions or great food.  Many times my wife and I will split a sandwich for lunch.  You can't go wrong with place.  The only drawback is that parking on St Germaine St call be a problem so you may want to get there early.

data.title: OMG
data.text: Excellant!!! Delicious. Wide variwty, loved the spice... The ravioli cream sauce to die for. We will be back.

data.title: Pricey but ok food & drinks
data.text: Wide variety of food but inconsistent on flavor. Cool place. Cool bartender. Good pours. Food is great when they're on it but not always reliable. A bit pricey but worth it when good

data.title: Great atmosphere
data.text: Good food, great menu choices, beer selection awesome. The place has a back entrance that you would miss if you don't know it's there, pro tip.
